thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 20 of 7354
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I needed to re-order the same item sometimes and it is easy to log-in and check past orders, click on the item and order it again. One suggestion to B&W is that they might add, "Re-Order" as an option when checking past orders which would make it easier to reorder ink cartridges and paper and other items that are frequently re-ordered. It is always easy to find what I am after -- their website sets or at least ties the standards for what a quality website should be like which contains many thousands of items for sale.
